meanings.sent1: The basement was gloomier than the rest of the house.
meanings.sent2: The room became gloomier as the sun set.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to navigate the gloomier corners of the room was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The forest grew gloomier as the shadows deepened.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house had a gloomier atmosphere than any other place I had visited.

meanings.definition: Feeling or showing sadness or despondency
meanings.sent1: She had a gloomier expression after hearing the bad news.
meanings.sent2: The rainy weather made everyone feel gloomier than usual.
meanings.sent3: Despite his gloomier mood, he still managed to crack a joke.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt gloomier than the storm clouds above.
meanings.sent5: The old man's eyes held a gloomier look, hinting at past sorrows.
